TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LengthConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 在其他資料型別的執行個體與表示物件長度的 執行個體之間進行轉換。

span.span: Converts instances of other types to and from instances of a that represent an object's length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援下列型別來回轉換： ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，以及。 supports conversion to and from the following types: , , , , , , , , , and . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立和使用的執行個體物件。The following example shows how to create and use an instance of the object. 呼叫自訂方法`ChangeLeft`定義，則可將轉換的內容(定義於個別[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案) 的執行個體，和更新版本到。A custom method called `ChangeLeft` is defined, which converts the content of a (defined in a separate [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] file) to an instance of , and later into a . 此方法會傳遞要物件，然後將轉換的執行個體。This method passes the to a object, which converts the to an instance of . 請注意，這個值已經轉換成使用方法。Notice that this value has already been converted to a by using the method. 此值接著會傳回到方法和方法若要變更的位置`text1`物件。This value is then passed back to the method and the method of the in order to change the position of the `text1` object. [!code-csharp[CanvasPositioningProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasPositioningProperties/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CanvasPositioningProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasPositioningProperties/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]
